channel.title: RuneVerfix Re-Release
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]NOTE I AM NOT THE REAL OWNER OF THIS SO DONT FLAME![/size][/b] [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2ur830k.png[/img] Base: Project insanity Client base: Galkons Refactored
This has alot of work put in, tbh everything isnt listed below. 602 anims gfx, gameframe switching, 621 items (almost all current rs items) etc... If you use atleast rep me
Also has 100% items on death interface, and new RS loginbox + loading screen. vids:
YouTube - RuneVerFix
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=awptOScWO_4
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h65o-O1JltA
Awesome RVMV: YouTube - [RVMV] RuneVerfix music video - promise me
~ Features ~
- All the features PI have - Skillcape Emotes - Skilling area! (no boring PVP only server!) - 24/7 online - Turmoil - Webclient - PVP armours - Kill/death ratio - Dragon Claws - Full GWD - Dragon Fireshield Special when operated - 525+ Emotes - 525+ Gfx’s - All specials work - Ice barrage multi freeze - Pest Control - Perfect Combat - Amazing Stability - Duel Arena - King Black Dragon - All Skills Working! - Amazing fight pits, working orbs, watch the other players while in waiting area! - Auto Retaliate works - Dark Bow special working perfectly - Clan Chat - Custom Made Aussult - 100% Working clue scrolls - Toggling for Status orbs on/off - Toggling for new/old Hp bar - Toggling for new/old hitmarks - Toggling for transparent/normal right click menu - Toggling for X10 Hits - Toggling for fog - Toggling for HP above heads - Toggling for Names above heads - Private chat color changing - Pk points shop & PK points - PVP armour - Fully functional EP, you get PVP drops! When you get a PVP drop, you'll lose 100 EP points - Animated Tormented demon - Alot of area's to explore - Safe timer - You gain PK points in Wilderness, and PVP drops & EP in the two PVP citties Varrock, and Falador. - New emote interface, with air guitar, snowman dance, freeze n melt, and more - Flared trousers & wig emote - You may reset any combat skill you want, at any time! Helpfull if you were a pure, and accidently levled defence!
Pictures:
Quest tab: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/847859/questtab.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/847964/ep.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/qzgqbk.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/qzgqbk.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/rr89d5.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/330bpmg.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2du0414.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/wkimv8.png[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/dq13tc.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/33c52fq.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/rh3hb7.png[/img] [size=14pt]VIDEOS[/size] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/30ihzqv.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/847900/tele.gif[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/11i0bnq.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/bi8n6t.gif[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ijp1za.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2aklq49.gif[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/r26d7o.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ccxf7d.gif[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/vompvc.gif[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/96avfb.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2lbcs5j.gif[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/98vl9j.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/848077/wigggygg.gif[/img]
Download (Packaged, cleint + server. Put the runeverfix cache folder in C:/) It's located in the client
http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip
Credits:
- ME - Sanity - Galkon - ZRPS - SWAT - K4rn4ge
FOR FIXING QUEST TAB:
Under initialize() in client.java add
Code: getPA().writeQuestTab();[/center]

item.title: RuneVerfix Re-Release
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Nah, it actually Isn’t i used this last year, almost 2 years ago,
I had it on my desktop when I went on vacation, and I coded the shit out of it for learning purposes,
It may look the same and have the same Anims and etc…, but it’s actually pretty decent, it does however lack in content.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneVerfix Re-Release
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

  1. All content posted must be yours and yours ONLY! If broken, a punishment will be given depending on the material posted and the situation at hand. People helping out here and there is, of course, allowed, as long as the majority of the project belongs to you. There is an exception though: if it was a team project it is okay for all members to own credit and to be posted only if credit is given where credit is due.

Read the rules.

Also its just DSPK anyway

Read full topic

item.title: RuneVerfix Re-Release
item.dc:creator: @RuneVerfix RuneVerfix
item.description:
@RuneVerfix wrote:

[center][size=36pt]NOTE I AM NOT THE REAL OWNER OF THIS SO DONT FLAME![/size]

Base: Project insanity
Client base: Galkons Refactored

This has alot of work put in, tbh everything isnt listed below. 602 anims gfx, gameframe switching, 621 items (almost all current rs items) etc… If you use atleast rep me

Also has 100% items on death interface, and new RS loginbox + loading screen.
vids:

YouTube - RuneVerFix

Awesome RVMV: YouTube - [RVMV] RuneVerfix music video - promise me

~ Features ~

  • All the features PI have
  • Skillcape Emotes
  • Skilling area! (no boring PVP only server!)
  • 24/7 online
  • Turmoil
  • Webclient
  • PVP armours
  • Kill/death ratio
  • Dragon Claws
  • Full GWD
  • Dragon Fireshield Special when operated
  • 525+ Emotes
  • 525+ Gfx’s
  • All specials work
  • Ice barrage multi freeze
  • Pest Control
  • Perfect Combat
  • Amazing Stability
  • Duel Arena
  • King Black Dragon
  • All Skills Working!
  • Amazing fight pits, working orbs, watch the other players while in waiting area!
  • Auto Retaliate works
  • Dark Bow special working perfectly
  • Clan Chat
  • Custom Made Aussult
  • 100% Working clue scrolls
  • Toggling for Status orbs on/off
  • Toggling for new/old Hp bar
  • Toggling for new/old hitmarks
  • Toggling for transparent/normal right click menu
  • Toggling for X10 Hits
  • Toggling for fog
  • Toggling for HP above heads
  • Toggling for Names above heads
  • Private chat color changing
  • Pk points shop & PK points
  • PVP armour
  • Fully functional EP, you get PVP drops! When you get a PVP drop, you’ll lose 100 EP points
  • Animated Tormented demon
  • Alot of area’s to explore
  • Safe timer
  • You gain PK points in Wilderness, and PVP drops & EP in the two PVP citties Varrock, and Falador.
  • New emote interface, with air guitar, snowman dance, freeze n melt, and more
  • Flared trousers & wig emote
  • You may reset any combat skill you want, at any time! Helpfull if you were a pure, and accidently levled defence!

Pictures:

Quest tab:


qzgqbk.png757×999

qzgqbk.png757×999

rr89d5.png757×975


2du0414.png953×598

wkimv8.png782×540




[size=14pt]VIDEOS[/size]












Download (Packaged, cleint + server. Put the runeverfix cache folder in C:/) It’s located in the client

http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip
http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip
http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip
http://uppit.com/e2rzlprau5g5/RuneVerfix_relas6.zip

Credits:

  • ME
  • Sanity
  • Galkon
  • ZRPS
  • SWAT
  • K4rn4ge

FOR FIXING QUEST TAB:

Under initialize() in client.java add

Code:
getPA().writeQuestTab();[/center]

Read full topic
